title: HOUR 1 - Cowboys, Big 10, Bears

description:
Don't be surprised if the Cowboys get rid of Amari Cooper

The redemption of the Big 10

More on Matt Nagy possibly being fired soon

The NFL head coaches that should keep their job for now


Guest: Mark Schlereth
